attributes.review:
â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸ğŸš«PLEASE AVOID THIS APP UNTIL ITS FIXED!!ğŸš«â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸â€¼ï¸
This app made my phone crash and over heat!!! i know we need to support our *lovely* president donald trump but this app is dangerous, it's almost like making your phone into a bomb! I asked about it in my fishing group of facebook (using my son's phone because MY phone wasn't working at the time) and they said if you're phone heats up too much it can explode?! So I hurried to delete the app so it doesn't hurt my family, because that's what a father does, right?! Plus I learned if it crashes you have to spend hours on the phone with tech support, and they were barely helpful, so if you'd rather not deal with all the worry and stress I'd recommend sticking to websites, it's better than risking your families life and wasting your time with customer support!

attributes.title: My dog is now dead
